Metadata.name: Delicate Music Tweaks
Metadata.author: Pixelguin, rudiger__gb, MeovvCAT, T-Pose Ratkechi
Metadata.description:
A small collection of "vanilla-plus" music enhancements to P4G's original soundtrack, suitable for first-time players and longtime fans.
This is an enhancement mod, not an overhaul - the goal is not to change every track but to add a bit of variety on top of an already top-tier OST.
For a list of changes and explanations, visit https://docs.google.com/document/d/1VPda-tPrKipcLlP0AXuVeGVkxkOxP8gPN36w5_4jUCY/view
